title: Tech Pioneer: An Interview with Floyd Kvamme - Part 2
itunes:title: Tech Pioneer: Interview with Floyd Kvamme - Part 2
description: Welcome back to the second half of our discussion with Floyd Kvamme where he continues the conversation of his career in business but also shares how it intersected with the political world and finally insights on his faith and its impact on his work.
content:encoded: Welcome back to the second half of our discussion with Floyd Kvamme where he continues the conversation of his career in business but also shares how it intersected with the political world and finally insights on his faith and its impact on his work.
